.. _`Seaborn Categorical Swarmplot`:

SEABORN CATEGORICAL SWARMPLOT
=============================

Build a Categorical Swarmplot over categorical data





Example
-------

This meta-wrapper can be used in the following way:

.. code-block:: python

    rule test_seaborn_categorical_histogram:
        input:
            "table.tsv",
            "table2.tsv"
        output:
            png = "plot.png",
            tsv = "freq.tsv"
        params:
            column = "Value",
            index = "Idx"
        log:
            "logging.txt"
        wrapper:
            "0.66.0-240-gd9cffe8c/bio/seaborn/categorical_swarmplot"


Note that input, output and log file paths can be chosen freely.
When running with

.. code-block:: bash

    snakemake --use-conda

the software dependencies will be automatically deployed into an isolated environment before execution.



Notes
-----

Parameters:

* column: the name of the column to plot




Authors
-------


* Thibault Dayris



Code
----
